resources.string: "Talk to us about which program best suits your professional goals."

An integration of two major disciplines, management and technology, BIM aids your analytical and technical skills required to make best use of the ever evolving world of information. Information provides a great deal of power and en route to the degree, students learn how to master that power with an elevated maturity and responsibility. The objective of this undergraduate program offered by Tribhuvan University is to teach the students about the disciplines of properly managing information for its most ethical and productive use. The world of information is vast and many areas of it remain unexplored. The degree offers an opportunity to study and discover the possibilities in the world of information as well as take those discoveries to the market for their desired purpose.

When you have two options, flipping the coin cannot be the only solution. A choice that will dictate your life, a choice that will stick to you for a long time. With the hardships of joining a new institution comes an unfathomable decision to make, a decision to shape your future and maybe your entire life.
At Student Helper we’re constantly working to help young students take their future in their own hands. We’re gathering information about everything a high-school graduate might need before and after joining a college. From general college information to alumni testimonials, important notices to archived question papers, we will be helping you to keep track of your future with a few simple clicks.

A degree for those who want the driver’s seat. Learn the disciplines of business administration to get your career started on the right path. Four years to learn and enhance your managerial skills theoretically and practically. Offered by many popular universities, BBA is one of the most widespread business degrees in Nepal. BBA is designed to couple the business studies and their application in the real world of today. The execution of one’s creative ideas teamed up with the business knowledge to successfully take it to the market and make money.
